trans-unit.source: Select registrations with the status “included” and try again.
trans-unit.target: Selecteer registraties met de status “Actief” en probeer het opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: You're about to download an Excel file with all of the registrations included in the last payment(s).
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt een Excel-bestand te downloaden met alle registraties die zijn opgenomen in de meest recente betaling(en).

trans-unit.source: Would you like to proceed with registration(s)?
trans-unit.target: Wilt u verder gaan met registratie(s)?

trans-unit.source: There are registration(s) that don't support this action
trans-unit.target: Er zijn registratie(s) die deze actie niet ondersteunen

trans-unit.source: You're about to unpause debit card number .
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt om de VISA kaart met nummer te hervatten.

trans-unit.source: If you have any questions about our use of necessary cookies, please feel free to contact us at:
trans-unit.target: Als je vragen hebt over ons gebruik van noodzakelijke cookies, kun je contact met ons opnemen via:

trans-unit.source: The action "Validate" can only be applied to registrations with the "Registered" status.
trans-unit.target: De actie "Goedkeuren" kan alleen worden toegepast op registraties met de status "Geregistreerd".

trans-unit.source: The action "Decline" can not be applied to registrations with the "Completed" status.
trans-unit.target: De actie "Afwijzen" kan niet worden toegepast op registraties met de status "Completed".

trans-unit.source: You're about to download an Excel file for all duplicate registrations.
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt een Excel-bestand te downloaden met alle duplicaten.

trans-unit.source: Use your work email to log in.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik uw werk-e-mailadres om in te loggen.

trans-unit.source: Select a message from the template messages or write a custom message.
trans-unit.target: Selecteer een bericht uit de templates of schrijf een custom bericht.

trans-unit.source: There has been no export yet.
trans-unit.target: Er is nog geen export geweest.

trans-unit.source: I understand this action can not be undone.
trans-unit.target: Ik begrijp dat deze actie niet ongedaan kan worden gemaakt.

trans-unit.source: There is currently no data to export
trans-unit.target: Er zijn momenteel geen gegevens om te exporteren

trans-unit.source: They do not require explicit consent, and by using our website, you agree to their use. However, you may still manage or block these cookies via your browser settings.
trans-unit.target: Ze vereisen geen expliciete toestemming en door onze website te gebruiken, stemt u in met het gebruik ervan. U kunt deze cookies echter nog steeds beheren of blokkeren via de instellingen van uw browser.

trans-unit.source: Tip: Press Command / Ctrl + Enter to submit.
trans-unit.target: Tip: Gebruik Command / Ctrl + Enter om te verzenden.

trans-unit.source: The following message will be sent to each registration in their language.
trans-unit.target: Het volgende bericht wordt naar elke selecteerde registratie in hun voorkeurstaal verzonden.

trans-unit.source: You're about to reset 's password. The user will receive an email with the new password sent to their registered email address. Only proceed if the user has requested this action.
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt om het wachtwoord van resetten. Deze gebruiker ontvangt een e-mail met het nieuwe wachtwoord op zijn geregistreerde e-mailadres. Ga alleen verder als de gebruiker deze actie heeft aangevraagd.

trans-unit.source: This might take a few minutes. The file will be automatically downloaded when ready. Closing this notification will not cancel the export.
trans-unit.target: Dit kan enkele minuten duren. Het bestand wordt automatisch gedownload. Het sluiten van deze melding zal de export niet annuleren.

trans-unit.source: Custom messages are not automatically translated to the registration's preferred language.
trans-unit.target: Custom berichten worden niet automatisch vertaald naar de voorkeurstaal van de registratie.

trans-unit.source: No PowerBI dashboard has been configured for this project, please contact support@121.global to set this up
trans-unit.target: Er is geen PowerBI-dashboard geconfigureerd voor dit project. Neem contact op support@121.global om dit in te stellen.

trans-unit.source: Invalid email or password. Double-check your credentials and try again.
trans-unit.target: Ongeldig e-mailadres of wachtwoord. Controleer uw inloggegevens en probeer het opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: The confirm password must be equal to the new password.
trans-unit.target: De wachtwoorden moeten gelijk zijn aan elkaar.
Gebruik @ om gepersonaliseerde velden toe te voegen.

trans-unit.source: Project not found. Please check the URL and try again.
trans-unit.target: Project niet gevonden. Controleer de URL (link) en probeer het opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: This action can not be undone. Are you sure you want to delete these registrations?
trans-unit.target: Deze actie kan niet ongedaan gemaakt worden. Weet u zeker dat u deze registraties wilt verwijderen?

trans-unit.source: Cash distributed in the last payment.
trans-unit.target: Geld uitgekeerd bij de laatste betaling.

trans-unit.source: The action "Delete" can not be applied to registrations with the "Completed" status.
trans-unit.target: De actie "Verwijderen" kan niet worden toegepast op registraties met de status "Voltooid".

trans-unit.source: Note that if you go over 160 characters the Person affected may receive the message as multiple texts, if they have a feature-(non-smart-)phone.
trans-unit.target: Houd er rekening mee dat als u meer dan 160 tekens gebruikt, de hulpvrager het bericht als meerdere sms-berichten kan ontvangen, als ze een feature-(niet-smart-)telefoon hebben.

trans-unit.source: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. If you wish to disable cookies, please refer to your browser's help section. Note that disabling necessary cookies may affect the website's functionality.
trans-unit.target: Met de meeste browsers kunt u cookies beheren via hun instellingen. Als u cookies wilt uitschakelen, raadpleegt u de helpsectie van uw browser. Houd er rekening mee dat het uitschakelen van noodzakelijke cookies de functionaliteit van de website kan beïnvloeden.

trans-unit.note: The contents of the square brackets should not be touched/changed

trans-unit.source: *Please make sure registration data is available for all used personalized fields.
trans-unit.target: *Zorg ervoor dat gegevens beschikbaar zijn voor alle gebruikte gepersonaliseerde velden.

trans-unit.source: The message must be at least 20 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Het bericht moet minimaal 20 tekens lang zijn.

trans-unit.source: * To use a subscope type a dot between the scope and subscope (e.g. amsterdam.west)
trans-unit.target: * Om een subconnectie te gebruiken typ je een punt tussen de connectie en subconnectie (bijv. amsterdam.west)

trans-unit.source: Latest export has been done on:
trans-unit.target: De laatste export is gedaan op:

trans-unit.source: The note will be visible to other 121 users who are permitted to view personal profiles.
trans-unit.target: De notitie is zichtbaar voor andere 121 gebruikers die persoonlijke profielen mogen bekijken.

trans-unit.source: This action can not be applied to the registrations you have selected.
trans-unit.target: Deze actie kan niet worden toegepast op de registraties die u hebt geselecteerd.

trans-unit.source: You're about to download an Excel file for all status & data changes.
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt een Excel-bestand te downloaden voor alle status- en datawijzigingen.

trans-unit.source: You are about to add a note to 's profile.
trans-unit.target: Je staat op het punt een notitie toe te voegen aan het profiel van .

trans-unit.source: The action "Pause" can only be applied to registrations with the "Included" status.
trans-unit.target: De actie "Pauzeren" kan alleen worden toegepast op registraties met de status 'Actief'.

trans-unit.source: This will download an Excel file showing the balance of every card from the last payment(s).
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt een Excel-bestand gedownload met het saldo van elke kaart van de laatste betaling(en).

trans-unit.source: Enter a valid scope. No spaces are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Voer een geldige connectie in. Spaties zijn niet toegestaan.

trans-unit.source: You're about to download an Excel file for selected registrations.
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt een Excel-bestand te downloaden voor geselecteerde registraties.

trans-unit.source: There are no payments for this project yet.
trans-unit.target: Er zijn nog geen betalingen uitgevoerd in dit project.

trans-unit.source: The base transfer value is multiplied by a set factor for each registration. For example, if the base value is $50 and the multiplier is based on household size, a 3-person household would receive $150 per payment.
trans-unit.target: De standaard overdrachtswaarde wordt voor elke registratie vermenigvuldigd met een vaste factor. Als de standaardwaarde bijvoorbeeld $ 50 is en de vermenigvuldiger is gebaseerd op de grootte van het huishouden, ontvangt een huishouden van 3 personen $ 150 per betaling.

trans-unit.source: Necessary cookies are required for the basic operation of the platform.
trans-unit.target: Noodzakelijke cookies zijn nodig voor de basiswerking van het platform.

trans-unit.source: Select registrations who's “Payments left” is larger than 0 and try again.
trans-unit.target: Selecteer registraties waar "Resterende betalingen" groter is dan 0 (nul) en probeer het opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: This means that they will not be included in payments.
trans-unit.target: Dit betekent dat ze niet in de betalingen worden opgenomen.

trans-unit.source: Use the 'Last Message Status' column to check the progress of messages. Closing this notification will not cancel message sending.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik de kolom 'Status laatste bericht' om de voortgang van berichten te controleren. Het sluiten van deze melding annuleert het verzenden van berichten niet.

trans-unit.source: Amount of payments done in the project so far.
trans-unit.target: Aantal betalingen dat tot nu toe in het project is gedaan.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to send this message?
trans-unit.target: Weet u zeker dat u dit bericht wilt verzenden?

trans-unit.source: You must select this to proceed.
trans-unit.target: U moet dit selecteren om door te gaan.

trans-unit.source: Registration not found. Please check the URL and try again.
trans-unit.target: Registratie niet gevonden. Controleer de URL (link) en probeer het opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: The new password must be at least 8 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Het nieuwe wachtwoord moet minimaal 8 tekens lang zijn.

trans-unit.source: You're about to pause debit card number .
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt om VISA kaart met nummer te pauzeren.

trans-unit.source: This means that they can be included in payments.
trans-unit.target: Dit betekent dat ze in de betalingen kunnen worden opgenomen.

trans-unit.source: The data in this report is based on data that is imported every night from CBE. If you changed data today this will not be reflected in the report.
trans-unit.target: De gegevens in dit rapport zijn gebaseerd op gegevens die elke nacht worden geïmporteerd van CBE. Als u vandaag gegevens hebt gewijzigd, wordt dit niet weergegeven in het rapport.

trans-unit.source: They will not be included in payments.
trans-unit.target: Deze worden niet in de betalingen opgenomen.

trans-unit.source: Select registrations with other status and try again.
trans-unit.target: Selecteer registraties met een andere status en probeer het opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: Optionally pass a start date and/or an end date to filter the data changes. The export is limited to 100,000 data changes. Adapt your dates if needed.
trans-unit.target: Geef optioneel een begindatum en/of einddatum op om de datawijzigingen te filteren. De export is beperkt tot 100.000 wijzigingen. Pas indien nodig je data aan.

trans-unit.source: Total registrations excluding rejected and deleted registrations.
trans-unit.target: Totaal aantal registraties exclusief afgewezen en verwijderde registraties.

trans-unit.source: The new password must be different from the current password.
trans-unit.target: Het nieuwe wachtwoord moet anders zijn dan het huidige wachtwoord.

trans-unit.source: Important Notice: The unused vouchers available for download are not in real-time. The report includes the date and time of each voucher's last external update.
trans-unit.target: Belangrijk: De ongebruikte vouchers die beschikbaar zijn om te downloaden, zijn niet in realtime. Het rapport bevat de datum en tijd van de laatste externe update van elke voucher.

trans-unit.source: * Leaving this field empty means the team member will have access to all PAs
trans-unit.target: * Als je dit veld leeg laat, heeft het teamlid toegang tot alle registraties

trans-unit.source: Important Notice: The card balances available for download are not in real-time. The report includes the date and time of each card's last external update.
trans-unit.target: Belangrijk: De kaartsaldi die beschikbaar zijn om te downloaden, zijn niet in realtime. Het rapport bevat de datum en tijd van de laatste externe update van elke visakaart.

trans-unit.source: You are not assigned to any project(s) yet, contact the admin/supervisor to start using the 121 portal.
trans-unit.target: Je bent nog niet toegewezen aan een (of meerdere) project(en), neem contact op met de beheerder/supervisor om de 121 Portal te kunnen gebruiken.

trans-unit.source: Select registrations with another status and try again.
trans-unit.target: Selecteer registraties met een andere status en probeer het opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: The action "Include" can only be applied to registrations who's “Payments left” is larger than 0.
trans-unit.target: De actie "Activeren" kan alleen worden toegepast op registraties waarvan het aantal "Resterende betalingen" groter is dan 0.
U staat op het punt om registraties uit te voeren.

trans-unit.source: This will download an Excel file with all unused voucher(s).
trans-unit.target: Hiermee downloadt u een Excel-bestand met alle ongebruikte voucher(s).

trans-unit.source: You're about to remove () from your team.They will not have access to the project anymore.
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt om ( ) uit uw team te verwijderen. Zij hebben dan geen toegang meer tot het project.

trans-unit.source: Select registrations with the status “Registered” and try again.
trans-unit.target: Selecteer registraties met de status “Geregistreerd” en probeer het opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: There are no records that match the selected filters, clear some or all filters to continue.
trans-unit.target: Er zijn geen registraties die voldoen aan de geselecteerde filters. Wis enkele of alle filters om door te gaan.
Het controleren op duplicaten gebeurt op basis van:

trans-unit.source: The status of registration(s) is being changed to "" successfully. The status change can take up to a minute to process.
trans-unit.target: De status van registratie(s) wordt gewijzigd naar " " succesvol. Het kan tot een minuut duren voordat de statuswijziging is verwerkt.

trans-unit.source: The action "Decline" can not be applied to registrations with the "Completed" status. Registrations with “completed” status will remain with their current status.
trans-unit.target: De actie "Afwijzen" kan niet worden toegepast op registraties met de status "Voltooid". Registraties met de status "Voltooid" behouden hun huidige status.

trans-unit.source: The action "Delete" can not be applied to registrations with the "Completed" status. Registrations with “completed” status will remain with their current status.
trans-unit.target: De actie "Verwijderen" kan niet worden toegepast op registraties met de status "Voltooid". Registraties met de status "voltooid" behouden hun huidige status.

trans-unit.source: The action "Include" can only be applied to registrations who’s “Payments left” is larger than 0. Registrations with 0 payments left will remain with their current status.
trans-unit.target: De actie "Activeer" kan alleen worden toegepast op registraties waarvan het aantal "Resterende betalingen" groter is dan 0. Registraties met 0 resterende betalingen behouden hun huidige status.

trans-unit.source: The action "Pause" can only be applied to registrations with the "Included" status. Registrations with other statuses will remain with their current status.
trans-unit.target: De actie "Pauzeren" kan alleen worden toegepast op registraties met de status "Actief". Registraties met andere statussen behouden hun huidige status.

trans-unit.source: The action "Validate" can only be applied to registrations with the "Registered" status. Registrations with other statuses will remain with their current status.
trans-unit.target: De actie "Goedkeuren" kan alleen worden toegepast op registraties met de status "Geregistreerd". Registraties met andere statussen behouden hun huidige status.

trans-unit.source: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Rate limit overschreden. Probeer het later opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Er is een onverwachte fout opgetreden. Probeer het later opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: A message will be sent to the registration about this update.
trans-unit.target: Er wordt een bericht over deze update naar de registratie gestuurd.

trans-unit.source: Select one or more registrations and try again.
trans-unit.target: Selecteer één of meerdere registraties en probeer het opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: You're about to send a message to registration(s).
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt om een bericht te sturen naar registratie(s).

trans-unit.source: The system will create registrations with the status “registered”.
trans-unit.target: The system will create registrations with the status “registered”.

trans-unit.source: The import takes about 1 minute per 100 records
trans-unit.target: The import takes about 1 minute per 100 records

trans-unit.source: Make sure to match the required format of the template CSV-file. Download the template here.
trans-unit.target: Make sure to match the required format of the template CSV-file. Download the template here.

trans-unit.source: Something went wrong with this import. Please fix the errors reported below and try again.
trans-unit.target: Something went wrong with this import. Please fix the errors reported below and try again.

trans-unit.source: Payment not found. Please check the URL and try again.
trans-unit.target: Payment not found. Please check the URL and try again.

trans-unit.source: Unknown user account or authentication failed
trans-unit.target: Unknown user account or authentication failed

trans-unit.source: Review summary and click start payment.
trans-unit.target: Review summary and click start payment.

trans-unit.source: Some of the registrations you have selected are not eligible for this payment. Change your selection and try again
trans-unit.target: Some of the registrations you have selected are not eligible for this payment. Change your selection and try again

trans-unit.source: A payment is currently in progress. Please wait until it has finished.
trans-unit.target: A payment is currently in progress. Please wait until it has finished.

trans-unit.source: The total payment amount is calculated by summing up the transfer values of each included registration added to the payment.
trans-unit.target: The total payment amount is calculated by summing up the transfer values of each included registration added to the payment.

trans-unit.source: Review payment summary and follow the next steps:
trans-unit.target: Review payment summary and follow the next steps:

trans-unit.source: Click start payment, this will direct you to the payment page.
trans-unit.target: Click start payment, this will direct you to the payment page.

trans-unit.source: Save the exported XLSX-file in the format required by the Financial Service Provider.
trans-unit.target: Save the exported XLSX-file in the format required by the Financial Service Provider.

trans-unit.source: Upload the file to the Financial Service Provider’s portal.
trans-unit.target: Upload the file to the Financial Service Provider’s portal.

trans-unit.source: Export the FSP instructions from the payment page. This is only possible once the payment is no longer in progress.
trans-unit.target: Export the FSP instructions from the payment page. This is only possible once the payment is no longer in progress.

trans-unit.source: Below is a table of all registrations. Select registrations you would like to add to this payment.
trans-unit.target: Below is a table of all registrations. Select registrations you would like to add to this payment.

trans-unit.source: Please allow pop-up windows in your browser settings to login
trans-unit.target: Please allow pop-up windows in your browser settings to login

trans-unit.source: You're about to replace debit card number . This will block the current card and a new card will be issued.
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt om de VISA kaart met nummer te vervangen. De huidige kaart wordt geblokkeerd en wordt er een nieuwe kaart uitgegeven.

trans-unit.source: You do not have permission to view this page.
trans-unit.target: You do not have permission to view this page.

trans-unit.source: You are about to retry payment(s). The transfer status will change to Pending until received by the registration.
trans-unit.target: You are about to retry payment(s). The transfer status will change to Pending until received by the registration.

trans-unit.source: You're about to download an Excel file with the FSP instructions for this payment.
trans-unit.target: You're about to download an Excel file with the FSP instructions for this payment.

trans-unit.source: You're about to download an Excel file with all of the registrations included in this payment.
trans-unit.target: You're about to download an Excel file with all of the registrations included in this payment.

trans-unit.source: Import the file sent by the FSP to see the transfer status of the registrations included in this payment. Download the template here.
trans-unit.target: Import the file sent by the FSP to see the transfer status of the registrations included in this payment. Download the template here.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to upload the correct file as this will override the current file.
trans-unit.target: Make sure to upload the correct file as this will override the current file.

trans-unit.source: The status column in the file should contain one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: The status column in the file should contain one of the following values:

trans-unit.source: A payment is currently in progress. Please try again later
trans-unit.target: A payment is currently in progress. Please try again later

trans-unit.source: The payment will be in progress while the number of transfers sent, total amount and registrations in the table below are loading.
trans-unit.target: The payment will be in progress while the number of transfers sent, total amount and registrations in the table below are loading.

trans-unit.source: There are no records to display.
trans-unit.target: There are no records to display.

trans-unit.source: There are no registrations in this project yet. For information about importing registrations to your project check out the 121 Manual .
trans-unit.target: There are no registrations in this project yet. For information about importing registrations to your project check out the 121 Manual .

trans-unit.source: This field is dynamically generated based on the other name fields available below:
trans-unit.target: This field is dynamically generated based on the other name fields available below:

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of payments for this Person Affected. You can remove the limit by removing the value and saving.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of payments for this Person Affected. You can remove the limit by removing the value and saving.

trans-unit.source: The transfer value will be multiplied by this number for this Person Affected
trans-unit.target: The transfer value will be multiplied by this number for this Person Affected

trans-unit.source: The required format is: ONLY numbers, including country-code.
trans-unit.target: The required format is: ONLY numbers, including country-code.

trans-unit.source: Separate the parts with a dot (i.e. 'amsterdam.west').
trans-unit.target: Separate the parts with a dot (i.e. 'amsterdam.west').

trans-unit.source: Write a reason for the update
trans-unit.target: Write a reason for the update

trans-unit.source: Please fill out all required fields.
trans-unit.target: Please fill out all required fields.

trans-unit.source: Value does not match the required pattern:
trans-unit.target: Value does not match the required pattern:

trans-unit.source: Changes that you made may not be saved. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
trans-unit.target: Changes that you made may not be saved. Are you sure you wish to proceed?

trans-unit.source: This is automatically calculated based on Max. payments and payments sucessfully sent
trans-unit.target: This is automatically calculated based on Max. payments and payments sucessfully sent

trans-unit.source: We couldn't find any information linked to this person's phone number in the projects you have access to on the 121 Platform.
trans-unit.target: We couldn't find any information linked to this person's phone number in the projects you have access to on the 121 Platform.

trans-unit.source: When you receive a task, any information linked to the person's phone number found in active programs in the 121 Platform will appear here.
trans-unit.target: When you receive a task, any information linked to the person's phone number found in active programs in the 121 Platform will appear here.

trans-unit.source: Use the arrow keys or W A S D to play the game
trans-unit.target: Use the arrow keys or W A S D to play the game

trans-unit.source: This privacy notice tells you what to expect us to do with your personal information when you use the 121 Platform.
trans-unit.target: This privacy notice tells you what to expect us to do with your personal information when you use the 121 Platform.

trans-unit.source: Where we get personal information from
trans-unit.target: Where we get personal information from

trans-unit.source: Information you or your employer has provided us.
trans-unit.target: Information you or your employer has provided us.

trans-unit.source: Your e-mail address and/or your (full) name.
trans-unit.target: Your e-mail address and/or your (full) name.

trans-unit.source: Your IP-address and some information about the device and web-browser you use to access the 121 Platform.
trans-unit.target: Your IP-address and some information about the device and web-browser you use to access the 121 Platform.

trans-unit.source: We retain your e-mail address and name for as long as you are a user associated with a project/program on the 121 Platform.
trans-unit.target: We retain your e-mail address and name for as long as you are a user associated with a project/program on the 121 Platform.

trans-unit.source: We retain your e-mail address for as long as a project/program is stored on the 121 Platform.
trans-unit.target: We retain your e-mail address for as long as a project/program is stored on the 121 Platform.

trans-unit.source: We don't store your IP-address. We only use it to generate an anonymous identifier not linked to any personal information.
trans-unit.target: We don't store your IP-address. We only use it to generate an anonymous identifier not linked to any personal information.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is stored for max. 90 days in our logs-storage.
trans-unit.target: This identifier is stored for max. 90 days in our logs-storage.

trans-unit.source: The data of the 121 Platform is hosted in a Microsoft Azure-environment of The Netherlands Red Cross.
trans-unit.target: The data of the 121 Platform is hosted in a Microsoft Azure-environment of The Netherlands Red Cross.

trans-unit.source: We do not share any personal information with other third-parties.
trans-unit.target: We do not share any personal information with other third-parties.

trans-unit.source: We only use necessary cookies to be able to let users log in to the 121 Platform. These cookies are not used to track any (returning) use of the 121 Platform over time.
trans-unit.target: We only use necessary cookies to be able to let users log in to the 121 Platform. These cookies are not used to track any (returning) use of the 121 Platform over time.

trans-unit.source: If you have any questions regarding your privacy and the 121 Platform, feel free to contact us at:
trans-unit.target: If you have any questions regarding your privacy and the 121 Platform, feel free to contact us at:
